statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation < 5
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY precipitation DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM weather_data
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20 AND precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY date LIMIT 5
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 10 OR precipitation < 0.2 ORDER BY precipitation DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY temperature DESC, precipitation ASC
SELECT id, date FROM weather_data WHERE temperature >= 15 AND precipitation < 1.0 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location_id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location_id, SUM(solar_generation) AS total_solar_generation FROM EnergyGeneration GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyGeneration WHERE wind_generation > 100 ORDER BY wind_generation DESC;
SELECT location_id, date, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT location_id, date, solar_generation, wind_generation FROM EnergyGeneration WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY solar_generation DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location_id, date, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT location_id, date, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data
SELECT location_id, date, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT location_id, date, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5
SELECT date, energy_generation FROM energy_generation WHERE location_id = 3
SELECT location_id, capacity FROM energy_generation WHERE capacity >= 100
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_generation) AS total_energy FROM energy_generation GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_energy > 1000
SELECT date, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT date, energy_utilization FROM energy_utilization INNER JOIN energy_generation ON energy_utilization.location_id = energy_generation.location_id WHERE energy_generation.capacity > 500 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location_id, AVG(energy_utilization) AS avg_utilization, AVG(utilization_rate) AS avg_rate FROM energy_utilization GROUP BY location_id HAVING avg_rate > 0.8
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT AVG(wind_speed) AS avg_wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT location, energy_forecast FROM ForecastData WHERE date = '2021-10-10';
SELECT date, location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY date DESC, location ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, location, solar_generation, wind_generation FROM EnergyGeneration WHERE solar_generation > 500 OR wind_generation > 300 ORDER BY location ASC, date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, location, weather_condition, energy_forecast FROM ForecastData WHERE energy_forecast < 1000 ORDER BY location ASC, date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, location, energy_utilization, optimization_strategy FROM UtilizationData WHERE energy_utilization > 80 AND optimization_strategy = 'Efficient' ORDER BY date DESC, location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, location, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20 AND wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY temperature DESC, wind_speed ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city, country FROM location WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT solar_generation, wind_generation, total_energy FROM energy_forecast ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, energy_consumed, energy_produced FROM energy_utilization WHERE energy_produced > energy_consumed;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, city, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT date, energy_consumed, energy_produced, net_energy FROM energy_utilization WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY net_energy DESC;
SELECT date, solar_generation, wind_generation, total_energy FROM energy_forecast WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT date, solar_accuracy, wind_accuracy, overall_accuracy FROM forecast_accuracy WHERE overall_accuracy >= 90 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
